LABEL: 0x394
STRING: I return.

LABEL: 0x3B2
STRING: It's the same white room.

LABEL: 0x3D2
STRING: I don't realize it for a while.

LABEL: 0x408
STRING: ...Maybe I don't want to realize.

LABEL: 0x43C
STRING: Those vivid events, and...

LABEL: 0x464
STRING: ...An unwanted ending.

LABEL: 0x480
STRING: I can't admit it, as if refusing to wake up from a dream.

LABEL: 0x4C2
STRING: I wish for a continuation, for a true ending...

LABEL: 0x5A8
STRING: ...However.

LABEL: 0x5C2
STRING: As time passes, I wake up.

LABEL: 0x5EA
STRING: The fact that it was over, that the record has been cut off,

LABEL: 0x61E
STRING: is forcibly etched into my body and consciousness.

LABEL: 0x67E
STRING: I look at "her."

LABEL: 0x6A0
STRING: 「Why are you the only one left alive again?!」

LABEL: 0x6FC
STRING: Emotional words naturally flow out of my mouth.

LABEL: 0x72A
STRING: ――Momoi Yukari looks as if she's stifling her own emotions.

LABEL: 0x7FC
STRING: 「Well, Katagiri-san...」

LABEL: 0x820
STRING: 「That's because only the two of us survived.」

LABEL: 0x854
STRING: Her line, which sounds like a tautology, carries a distinctly different meaning.

LABEL: 0x8AA
STRING: Past tense against present tense.

LABEL: 0x8D0
STRING: This is the predetermined ending...

LABEL: 0x8F6
STRING: No matter how much I struggle, no matter how much I search for other possibilities,

LABEL: 0x936
STRING: no matter how many detours or steps I take...

LABEL: 0x968
STRING: ...The end result will always be the same.

LABEL: 0x9F7
STRING: ――No.

LABEL: 0xA0F
STRING: Everything I see before me is merely the result of several simulations.

LABEL: 0xA5F
STRING: Why, then, should I let myself be influenced by that?

LABEL: 0xA9F
STRING: No matter how hopeless the sea is, there's always a path that leads to the best possible outcome.

LABEL: 0xAEF
STRING: Then... what am I missing?

LABEL: 0xBD9
STRING: Before I know it, I'm looking straight into Yukari's eyes.

LABEL: 0xC09
STRING: They're very cold――

LABEL: 0xC29
STRING: What do her eyes see, I wonder.

LABEL: 0xC5B
STRING: What is reflected there?

LABEL: 0xC87
STRING: 「Do you still want to return to 2033, Katagiri-san?」

LABEL: 0xCBF
STRING: How many times have I nodded my head in confirmation to her question?

LABEL: 0xCFD
STRING: 「Of course... Please, let me try again.」

LABEL: 0xD3B
STRING: I repeat the same line once more, as if it has been decided for me.

LABEL: 0xD6D
STRING: 「Where should I start over from this time?」

LABEL: 0xD9F
STRING: 「Where――」

LABEL: 0xDBD
STRING: From what point, I wonder.

LABEL: 0xDDD
STRING: The choice between Saihouji Tokiwa and Nomura Reiri...

LABEL: 0xE0B
STRING: That had definitely been a major turning point.

LABEL: 0xE3D
STRING: A choice between two lives.

LABEL: 0xE5D
STRING: Letting one live and killing the other.

LABEL: 0xE8D
STRING: There will always be one loser.

LABEL: 0xEB3
STRING: As long as I have to make that choice, I won't be able to reach the best possible result.

LABEL: 0xF03
STRING: If that's the case... then it's already too late on the second day.

LABEL: 0xF35
STRING: I need an earlier point...

LABEL: 0xFC8
STRING: 「Unfortunately, there are no records from before August 1st.」

LABEL: 0x1004
STRING: The trolley has already started moving.

LABEL: 0x1026
STRING: You can't stop it.

LABEL: 0x1048
STRING: It contains within a single hopeless truth.

LABEL: 0x1084
STRING: 「Then... there's no way to stop the sinking.」

LABEL: 0x10BA
STRING: As of August 1st, there's no way to stop the navigation program that "he" had changed.

LABEL: 0x110A
STRING: 「That's correct.」

LABEL: 0x1126
STRING: That's obvious.

LABEL: 0x1146
STRING: The worst disaster itself can't be prevented.

LABEL: 0x118C
STRING: I have to aim for the best possible outcome within the worst.

LABEL: 0x1240
STRING: ...But.

LABEL: 0x1258
STRING: Even so, there are still those who have a chance.

LABEL: 0x128E
STRING: They were alive.

LABEL: 0x12AE
STRING: Everyone left in the front section was still alive, even if the ship had sunk.

LABEL: 0x130C
STRING: This tragic story that has been repeated over and over begins after the sinking.

LABEL: 0x1356
STRING: ...Then, what?

LABEL: 0x1378
STRING: What triggers further tragedy?

LABEL: 0x13A8
STRING: I look back and rummage through my memories.

LABEL: 0x13CE
STRING: I wonder if there's a clue somewhere.

LABEL: 0x13FA
STRING: I survey my surroundings in the empty room with no one but her inside it.

LABEL: 0x1436
STRING: A pure white room.

LABEL: 0x1450
STRING: A pure white――girl.

LABEL: 0x157A
STRING: Hikari.

LABEL: 0x158E
STRING: ――In the records, that frail girl had already lost her life by the time we met again.

LABEL: 0x15DE
STRING: This is just a hunch...

LABEL: 0x1602
STRING: A baseless idea, but...

LABEL: 0x163C
STRING: If I can save her, if I can save Hikari, maybe something will change.

LABEL: 0x168C
STRING: In the records, Nomura Touri had locked Hikari inside the pressurization room.

LABEL: 0x16CE
STRING: When she was found again, she was already floating in the sea as a corpse.

LABEL: 0x1714
STRING: That pressurization room where she was trapped in led into a sea of darkness...

LABEL: 0x17CC
STRING: Remember... When and why was that door opened――?

LABEL: 0x1869
STRING: 「Was it back then――?!」

LABEL: 0x1897
STRING: Then the key is Saihouji Tokiwa.

LABEL: 0x18BF
STRING: What caused her to make that statement?

LABEL: 0x18F9
STRING: I'm so close to reaching the end of this thread of causality.

LABEL: 0x192D
STRING: Just a little more...

LABEL: 0x194B
STRING: However, Momoi Yukari shakes her head silently.

LABEL: 0x1979
STRING: 「Katagiri-san, you should have realized by now.」

LABEL: 0x19BB
STRING: 「Because... you already know.」

LABEL: 0x19EF
STRING: Know... Know what?

LABEL: 0x1A6E
STRING: 「There's something you're misunderstanding.」

LABEL: 0x1AA8
STRING: Listen, said Yukari.

LABEL: 0x1AD2
STRING: 「――This is reality.」

LABEL: 0x1AF8
STRING: 「Me talking to you, this place, none of it is a simulation.」

LABEL: 0x1B4C
STRING: 「It's all real.」

LABEL: 0x1B6C
STRING: That... can't be.

LABEL: 0x1B9A
STRING: ...This conversation.

LABEL: 0x1BB8
STRING: It's an illusion the machine is showing me.

LABEL: 0x1BE0
STRING: 「If you think I'm lying, then make sure for yourself.」

LABEL: 0x1C12
STRING: Make sure... How?

LABEL: 0x1C38
STRING: That's easy...

LABEL: 0x1CBC
STRING: I put my hand on my smart glasses, close my eyes, and take them off.

LABEL: 0x1D02
STRING: 「It's not a lie... It's the undeniable truth.」

LABEL: 0x1D36
STRING: 「No matter how many times you redo it, it will all be the same.」

LABEL: 0x1D6C
STRING: 「Once fixed, the past cannot be changed.」

LABEL: 0x1D9C
STRING: 「What you're seeing are the "two survivors" that are set in stone.」

LABEL: 0x1E53
STRING: Again――I open my eyes.

LABEL: 0x1E75
STRING: Reality regains its contours.

LABEL: 0x1EA1
STRING: A white room and a white desk.

LABEL: 0x1EC1
STRING: Even if I remove my smart glasses and end the simulation,

LABEL: 0x1EFD
STRING: Momoi Yukari is still there.

LABEL: 0x1F1F
STRING: This... is reality?

LABEL: 0x1F3D
STRING: It's decided that there are only two survivors?

LABEL: 0x1F67
STRING: ...I feel terribly dizzy.

LABEL: 0x1F8B
STRING: I don't want to admit it, but I accept it somewhere deep in my mind.

LABEL: 0x1FD3
STRING: 「Even so...!」

LABEL: 0x1FF7
STRING: 「The best path is still there!」

LABEL: 0x2023
STRING: Even if only two people survive, I can still search for the best outcome.

LABEL: 0x2075
STRING: The possibility remains.

LABEL: 0x209B
STRING: 「You're still in denial, aren't you? ...It can't be helped. I used to be the same.」

LABEL: 0x20F3
STRING: In the brief silence, I can see Yukari choosing her next words carefully.

LABEL: 0x2137
STRING: Finally, as if she had made up her mind, she opens her mouth.

LABEL: 0x216F
STRING: 「Katagiri-san, I've been reviewing these records, and I have a question for you.」

LABEL: 0x21C1
STRING: 「This may sound strange, but could you answer it? You...」

LABEL: 0x220B
STRING: 「...Who are you?」

LABEL: 0x222B
STRING: Who... am I?

LABEL: 0x2247
STRING: 「In these records, you never introduced yourself in front of everyone.」

LABEL: 0x229B
STRING: 「You used a false name when you boarded.」

LABEL: 0x22CD
STRING: 「After that, even when your name was pointed out, you never gave your name yourself.」

LABEL: 0x2335
STRING: 「You unconsciously ran away from being yourself.」

LABEL: 0x2377
STRING: Her words are carefully spun, like a thin thread.

LABEL: 0x23B5
STRING: 「So... This is an extension of that, a hypothesis.」

LABEL: 0x23F3
STRING: 「Even after the accident, you unconsciously denied it, didn't you?」

LABEL: 0x2447
STRING: 「You still haven't identified yourself with "him," have you?」

LABEL: 0x2489
STRING: Then, she slowly pulls out a newspaper clipping.

LABEL: 0x24C5
STRING: 「You are you, and no one else.」

LABEL: 0x24F3
STRING: The names of the two survivors are written there.

LABEL: 0x25A9
STRING: ――A few days ago on August 1st at 14:00, <SHEEP III> left the coast of Kurama Bay and lost contact with the communications room at 17:19 the same day.

LABEL: 0x261D
STRING: %N%N　　Then at 17:33, due to an accident of unknown cause,%Ncontact with the surface was completely cut off.

LABEL: 0x267A
STRING: %N%N　　The next day, at around 13:00 on the 2nd, communication%Nwas temporarily restored.

LABEL: 0x26AC
STRING: %N%N　　Means to make contact was searched for, but accurate%Nlocation information couldn't be obtained. Shortly after,%Ncommunications were cut off again.

LABEL: 0x271C
STRING: %N%N　　On August 5th, the rescue team succeeded in entering%Nthe sunken <SHEEP III>. Two survivors were rescued.

LABEL: 0x2786
STRING: %N%N　　There were two survivors. One was Momoi Yukari of ROMLES,%Nwho was in charge of the voyage.

LABEL: 0x27DF
STRING: %N%N　　The other was a graduate student named――

LABEL: 0x2816
STRING: Katagiri

LABEL: 0x2821
STRING: Hitoha.

LABEL: 0x2857
STRING: Names written in ink on a piece of paper.

LABEL: 0x287F
STRING: Momoi Yukari and Katagiri Hitoha.

LABEL: 0x289F
STRING: Those words, which won't disappear even if I touch them, stand before me as a truth that doesn't allow me to alter it.

LABEL: 0x28FB
STRING: Everything I've been trying not to remember is about to overflow.

LABEL: 0x2941
STRING: Katagiri... Hitoha.

LABEL: 0x295B
STRING: That name.

LABEL: 0x2975
STRING: It overlaps with my own.

LABEL: 0x2999
STRING: 「It's a lie...」

LABEL: 0x29B3
STRING: 「It's a lie, a lie, a lie, a lie, a lie, a lie, a lie!」

LABEL: 0x29E5
STRING: 「I have to save everyone... I have to save them...」

LABEL: 0x2A29
STRING: 「――One more time! Let me go back one more time!」

LABEL: 0x2A65
STRING: 「If you give me one more chance, I'll definitely save everyone――」

LABEL: 0x2A93
STRING: This time...

LABEL: 0x2AA9
STRING: ...She doesn't nod.

LABEL: 0x2B75
STRING: 「...Katagiri-san.」

LABEL: 0x2B93
STRING: 「Have you finally come to terms with the meaning of this "story?"」

LABEL: 0x2BD7
STRING: I want to cover my ears and close my eyes.

LABEL: 0x2C03
STRING: 「No matter how many times you repeat the past, it doesn't change the fact that only the two of us survive.」

LABEL: 0x2C65
STRING: Even so, reality doesn't disappear.

LABEL: 0x2C97
STRING: 「You know that. That's why... you say you want to save everyone, but in the end, you resign to the truth that only two people will survive.」

LABEL: 0x2D1B
STRING: The newspaper article flashes back to my mind.

LABEL: 0x2D3F
STRING: 「However, there's a contradiction there. You recognize the conclusion of the "two survivors," yet you still try to save as many people as possible.」

LABEL: 0x2DB9
STRING: The confusion between the records and my memories is unraveling.

LABEL: 0x2DE1
STRING: 「That's why you can't accept the fact that you survived.」

LABEL: 0x2E37
STRING: The words in the newspaper article are like a mirror, reflecting the existence of "myself."

LABEL: 0x2E83
STRING: 「You couldn't accept that "Katagiri Hitoha" survived.」

LABEL: 0x2EC7
STRING: I had survived, leaving everyone else behind.

LABEL: 0x2F05
STRING: 「Why... How did this happen?」

LABEL: 0x2F67
STRING: Vertigo.

LABEL: 0x2F7B
STRING: Scenes from my memories surround me.

LABEL: 0x2F9F
STRING: Images of various moments appear and disappear before my eyes.

LABEL: 0x2FE1
STRING: It wasn't an artificial reproduction from a record.

LABEL: 0x300D
STRING: Memories that I've left behind assault me without context.

LABEL: 0x3067
STRING: 「I was just trying to find out the truth behind Nee-san's death...」

LABEL: 0x30B3
STRING: 「If I had known this would happen,

LABEL: 0x30E7
STRING: I wouldn't have planned any of it in the first place!」

LABEL: 0x311B
STRING: With nowhere to strike, I clench my fists and hang them mid-air.

LABEL: 0x315B
STRING: Regret and remorse turn into anger, and I cry out.

LABEL: 0x3191
STRING: Yukari looks at me calmly, even as my outburst of emotions hits her.

LABEL: 0x3243
STRING: 「In the world of finance, there's something called the "black swan theory."」

LABEL: 0x328B
STRING: 「In Europe, swans used to be thought of as nothing more than white birds.」

LABEL: 0x32D5
STRING: 「But in 1697, a black bird―a black swan―was found in Australia.」

LABEL: 0x3325
STRING: 「This was a huge shock to the ornithologists of the time. It rewrote their conventional knowledge.」

LABEL: 0x3387
STRING: 「This anecdote

LABEL: 0x33AD
STRING: led to the term "black swan,"

LABEL: 0x33FD
STRING: which refers to "unpredictable events that, because they are unpredictable, have major effects."」

LABEL: 0x3445
STRING: A black swan was discovered.

LABEL: 0x3467
STRING: But... had this accident really been unpredictable?

LABEL: 0x34B3
STRING: Yukari continues.

LABEL: 0x34CD
STRING: 「――This black swan theory has another interesting point.」

LABEL: 0x3513
STRING: 「"Once it has happened, we assume as if we could have predicted it in advance."」

LABEL: 0x3573
STRING: 「Take the bursting of the financial bubble that occurred nearly half a century ago, for example.」

LABEL: 0x35C1
STRING: 「Perhaps the "Fourth Day" was a black swan, as well.」

LABEL: 0x360D
STRING: 「And now, this accident.」

LABEL: 0x3635
STRING: It should have been predictable――

LABEL: 0x365F
STRING: This accident was bound to happen.

LABEL: 0x368F
STRING: The worst possible outcome could have been avoided.

LABEL: 0x36C1
STRING: That's what I had thought.

LABEL: 0x36E1
STRING: But... is that really true?

LABEL: 0x3766
STRING: 「The truth is, no one could have predicted it.」

LABEL: 0x379A
STRING: That's...

LABEL: 0x37B4
STRING: 「――That's just empty consolation!」

LABEL: 0x37E0
STRING: 「The reality is, I could have stopped the accident!」

LABEL: 0x3820
STRING: And yet, I...!

LABEL: 0x3842
STRING: 「That's impossible.」

LABEL: 0x385C
STRING: 「You didn't know a single thing about the cage that stretched across the sea.」

LABEL: 0x38AA
STRING: 「You had no way of knowing. How were you supposed to stop that?」

LABEL: 0x38FC
STRING: ...Even if that's true...

LABEL: 0x3920
STRING: 「Even if the accident was unavoidable, the tragedy that followed could've been prevented!」

LABEL: 0x396E
STRING: Yukari shouts as if to cover my words.

LABEL: 0x3992
STRING: 「It's the same thing!」

LABEL: 0x39AE
STRING: 「It was absolutely unpredictable.」

LABEL: 0x39D6
STRING: 「You couldn't have prevented the worst from happening.」

LABEL: 0x3A1E
STRING: She doesn't back down.

LABEL: 0x3A3A
STRING: She won't allow me to make things easier for myself by yelling in a fit of emotion.

LABEL: 0x3A88
STRING: But, if I couldn't have prevented it...

LABEL: 0x3AB6
STRING: If I can't bear the responsibility for this tragedy...

LABEL: 0x3AFE
STRING: If I accept that I was a victim of an unforeseen, unavoidable disaster...

LABEL: 0x3BC0
STRING: 「So please... don't blame yourself.」

LABEL: 0x3C0C
STRING: I find myself crying.

LABEL: 0x3C36
STRING: Shouting and screaming.

LABEL: 0x3CB9
STRING: It was me who caused the accident!

LABEL: 0x3CE1
STRING: They all lost their lives because of me!

LABEL: 0x3D11
STRING: I couldn't even keep everyone who survived alive!

LABEL: 0x3D6B
STRING: That heavy wedge was binding me to my purpose.

LABEL: 0x3DA7
STRING: I have to find a way to save everyone!

LABEL: 0x3DDD
STRING: I have to do something with my own two hands...!

LABEL: 0x3E76
STRING: But――

LABEL: 0x3E8E
STRING: Yukari releases me from those shackles.

LABEL: 0x3EBC
STRING: She says that I don't have to suffer anymore.

LABEL: 0x3EE2
STRING: She says that I don't have to fight anymore.

LABEL: 0x3F06
STRING: ――And, that I'm allowed to grieve their deaths, their tragedies.

LABEL: 0x3F4E
STRING: I'm the one who survived.

LABEL: 0x3F76
STRING: It's alright to lament their deaths and move forward.

LABEL: 0x3FC8
STRING: I want to save the dead.

LABEL: 0x4000
STRING: It doesn't matter if I don't survive myself.

LABEL: 0x4030
STRING: I want to save them―and yet!

LABEL: 0x405E
STRING: The feelings I can't put into words turn into overflowing tears and screams.

LABEL: 0x40A4
STRING: I can't stop myself.

LABEL: 0x40E0
STRING: Yukari――

LABEL: 0x40F6
STRING: Momoi Yukari, who says she forgives me,

LABEL: 0x4120
STRING: is still staring at me, crying inside this white room.

LABEL: 0x43DA
STRING: 「Hey, Katagiri-san.」

LABEL: 0x43FA
STRING: 「The Mary Celeste lived on as a story, and it has been passed down to this day.」

LABEL: 0x4450
STRING: 「Why do you think that is?」

LABEL: 0x4472
STRING: Finally, she begins to speak again.

LABEL: 0x453A
STRING: 「It's because of that strange story.」

LABEL: 0x4568
STRING: 「If the crew of the Dei Gratia hadn't found it, the story wouldn't have been passed down.」

LABEL: 0x45BC
STRING: 「In that sense, the Dei Gratia kept them alive for future generations.」

LABEL: 0x460A
STRING: What is spoken of lives on.

LABEL: 0x4636
STRING: Unbeknownst to anyone, the Mary Celeste hadn't disappeared with death,

LABEL: 0x467C
STRING: but continues to live on.

LABEL: 0x46B2
STRING: Through people's memories. Through stories.

LABEL: 0x46E0
STRING: 「Do you think that it's unforgivable... to turn a tragedy into entertainment?」

LABEL: 0x4732
STRING: 「Would it have been better, then, if they had been forgotten altogether?」

LABEL: 0x4780
STRING: Is that question directed at me?

LABEL: 0x47BC
STRING: Or is it for herself――

LABEL: 0x47E6
STRING: 「Tragedies will never disappear from this world because everyone is looking for them――」

LABEL: 0x4832
STRING: 「――Someone wrote about it that way, but my thoughts are different.」

LABEL: 0x487C
STRING: 「Even if it's a tragedy someone sought to kill time,

LABEL: 0x48BA
STRING: even if it's consumed in a way that goes against the will of the people involved,

LABEL: 0x4902
STRING: it's still a memory.」

LABEL: 0x4928
STRING: 「They can live on in our memories through stories.」

LABEL: 0x4976
STRING: In our memories――

LABEL: 0x4992
STRING: I recall the records I've experienced through my smart glasses.

LABEL: 0x49C8
STRING: Inside there, they are definitely alive.

LABEL: 0x49F8
STRING: Their figures are burned into my memory.

LABEL: 0x4A95
STRING: 「Katagiri-san, here's what I think...」

LABEL: 0x4AC3
STRING: 「When you aim for the best result and are met with the worst――」

LABEL: 0x4AFB
STRING: 「――I still think that's the best outcome.」

LABEL: 0x4B35
STRING: The newspaper article has the unchangeable past carved into it.

LABEL: 0x4B79
STRING: In writing, it's only a few lines long.

LABEL: 0x4BAD
STRING: Sternly written information. A diminutive record that no one will remember.

LABEL: 0x4C65
STRING: However... everyone's stories are contained within.

LABEL: 0x4C9B
STRING: Nomura Touri's,

LABEL: 0x4CB5
STRING: Nomura Reiri's,

LABEL: 0x4CCF
STRING: Hiragino Sousuke's,

LABEL: 0x4CE9
STRING: Saihouji Tokiwa's...

LABEL: 0x4D07
STRING: The fifty people's, whose lives were taken in an instant...

LABEL: 0x4D33
STRING: All of their stories are there.

LABEL: 0x4D6B
STRING: 「You survived.」

LABEL: 0x4D8F
STRING: 「There's no meaning behind it. No one could have foreseen why you or I survived.」

LABEL: 0x4DFD
STRING: 「The meaning of your survival is something you have to grasp from now on.」

LABEL: 0x4E4F
STRING: ――Don't pretend that it never happened.

LABEL: 0x4E7F
STRING: Even if their unavoidable deaths are set in stone,

LABEL: 0x4EB7
STRING: you mustn't let it all end there.

LABEL: 0x4EF3
STRING: Just as the Dei Gratia has passed down the tragedy of the Mary Celeste to future generations,

LABEL: 0x4F41
STRING: I have to pass on this tale.

LABEL: 0x4F81
STRING: For that reason.

LABEL: 0x4F9B
STRING: For that reason, I...

LABEL: 0x4FBD
STRING: Katagiri Hitoha, survived.

LABEL: 0x4FFF
STRING: Once more,

LABEL: 0x5012
STRING: I look down at the newspaper article.
